name: Field of Bullets
description:
Field of Bullets is a top down bullet hell game where you fight an extremely challenging boss. There are no lives or health in this game. One hit and you are dead.

This game was made in 88 hours for the MOONMOON_OW discord game jam.

Clip of MoonMoon playing it: https://clips.twitch.tv/ElegantRealUdonBCWarrior
